posts.message:
Be Critical

The next time you come across the ActiveRecord vs. Data Mapper argument, or ones like it, be critical of what is being said. If it impacts your work in some way, do some research to find out if what is being said is true or if it has been something lost in translation. Don't feel bad for using a pattern that has spread across multiple languages and ecosystems successfully, and is probably the reason we have most of the web frameworks we do today. While the ActiveRecord existed well before Rails, it was Rails that gave it a beautiful API and made other frameworks like CodeIgniter, Laravel, .NET, Fuel, Django, etc want to have something comparable.

posts.message:
Hello

I'm working on some project that is mainly a social network and I want to use a SPA enabled framework

I was digging a bit and found few options eliminated some and two were left

1 the full meteor stack

2 ReactJS on Rails

Well actually I'm confused what to use

i don't need all the fancy DDP and auto publishing with meteor and I think this would be a problem in scaling because of the sticky sessions
( not the fancy scaling ) here I get frustrated by the framework as its not agile friendly you should follow ur own methodology *atleast that was the result of my research*

On the other hand rails and react are both perfect in terms of agile development .. I havent used react before but had a sneak peak at its features
But here I'm worried the code may get more complex and I'm not sure if rails would do better than meteor concerning performance

Need to know ur opinions guys and thank you!

السلام عليكم 
لو سمحتم ياجماعة انا كنت عاوز اجيب جهاز walk pads لل virtual reality.

فاجيبه منين؟ واسعاره تبدأ من كام ؟

شكرا

posts.message:
سلام عليكم

البوست ده فيه شوية معلومات عن التقديم في دبلومة computer science الي في معهد الاحصاء الي تبع جامعة القاهرة

التقديم كان آخر ميعاد له السنة دي 22-9
بس هما مدوا التقديم شوية لبعد العيد عشان لسه في ناس بتروح تسأل وعايزة تقدم

عشان تقدم في الدبلومة لازم تعدي امتحانين قبول c++ و math
ودول ليهم كورسات مكثفة قبل الامتحان

في دورة c++ شغالة حاليا وامتحانها يوم الأحد الجي، من الساعه 10 صباحا في ساعتين مراجعه، بعديهم الامتحان
مش عارف اذا كان في دورة وامتحان c++ تانيين بعد العيد ولا ﻷ، بس كانو بيتكلمو انهم ممكن يعملو كده لو في عدد عايز الكورس ده

بالنسبة لدورة وامتحان الرياضة، في دورة هتبدأ بعد العيد من يوم 28-9 لغاية 1-10 كل يوم 4 ساعات

انا صورت شوية امتحانات قديمة عشان الي مش هيلحق يروح الدورة ويروح عالامتحان بس

- ممكن تدفع رسوم امتحان القبول بس لو حابب ومتدفعش رسوم الدورة كلها
- رسوم الدورات : 350 لـ c++ و 250 الرياضة
In case anyone is facing the same problem on Linux 14.04 or any other destro you may find this link is useful for speeding up your internet connection on Linux.
posts.caption: askubuntu.com
posts.description: My wired internet is running extremely slow after installing Ubuntu 14.04 on my desktop. my normal internet speed (Windows) using speedtest.net is around 25 mbps, Ubuntu is pulling in 0.5 mbps tops.
